alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Kaibab Plateau; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim; Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 2:02PM MST until February 24 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...After a lu tonight, heavy snow is expected again Thursday afternoon through Friday morning. Additional snow accumulations of up to 10 inches, see table below for site specific forecasts. Winds gusting to 40 to 50 mph Thursday afternoon into Friday morning. * WHERE...Areas near Doney Park, Flagstaff, Forest Lakes, Fredonia, Heber-Overgaard, Jacob Lake, Prescott, Prescott Valley, Sedona, Seligman and Williams. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage. Additional snow forecast from 1 PM Today to 11 AM Friday: Doney Park 8 to 12 inches Flagstaff 15 to 21 inches Forest Lakes 14 to 20 inches Fredonia 2 to 4 inches Heber-Overgaard 2 to 4 inches Jacob Lake 9 to 15 inches Prescott 5 to 9 inches Prescott Valley 2 to 4 inches Sedona 2 to 4 inches Seligman 2 to 4 inches Williams 11 to 17 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
